Tecmo News 12/8
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: The Monster Rancher Street Team -Join Us!: Miscellaneous Q&A: Tecmo News 12/8
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, December 8, 2009 - 04:26 pm:

I have a couple of bits of news from the big guys!

They are currently working on setting up a dedicated MRDS webpage to keep everyone updated and to show off all of the info, screens, etc. about the game.

They are also going to get us some graphics we can use to make our own posters, t-shirts, etc.

As always, I recommend that you become a fan of the dedicated MRDS Facebook page, you can get there via the MRM Facebook page linked on the left side of this site.
